title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. Q, pt. 210 - Relocation Payments For Acquisition Of Real Property By The Commissioner Of Education
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. Q, pt. 210 - Relocation Payments For Acquisition Of Real Property By The Commissioner Of Education

State Regulations
§ 210.1 - Relocation payments governed by this part
§ 210.2 - Definitions
§ 210.3 - General provisions
§ 210.4 - Residential moving expenses
§ 210.5 - Actual moving expenses for business concerns
§ 210.6 - "in lieu of" moving expenses for a business or commercial occupant
§ 210.7 - Supplemental relocation payments
§ 210.8 - General and miscellaneous provisions for supplemental relocation payments
§ 210.9 - Reimbursement for taxes, rents, levies and charges paid by the dislocated person or other entity to a taxing entity
§ 210.10 - Hardship cases

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. Q, pt. 210

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§207, 307

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
